SELECT h.*, c.name AS cinema_name FROM hall h LEFT JOIN cinema c ON h.cinema_id = c.id
AND h.cinema_id = #{cinemaId}
AND h.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
ORDER BY h.cinema_id ASC, h.name ASC
SELECT * FROM hall WHERE cinema_id = #{cinemaId} AND status = 1 ORDER BY name ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hall (cinema_id, name, seat_rows, seat_cols, hall_type, status) VALUES (#{cinemaId}, #{name}, #{seatRows}, #{seatCols}, #{hallType}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE hall SET cinema_id = #{cinemaId}, name = #{name}, seat_rows = #{seatRows}, seat_cols = #{seatCols}, hall_type = #{hallType}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
